dict.acceptation: 每年的；一年的；[植物]一年生的；

sent.orig: Assist on finishing annual auditing, annual financial completion, annual inspector, annual tax clearance and assessment.
sent.trans: 负责协助完成年度审计，年度财务决算，企业年检，税务年检等。

sent.orig: She lowered the volume of annual forecast that annual turnover fell daily average turnover 130000-135000 million.
sent.trans: 她下调了对全年成交量的预测，认为全年成交量将同比下降40%至42%，即日均成交1300亿至1350亿。

sent.orig: The annual rainfall distribution is balanced, the summer autumn is frequent, mean annual precipitation 619 millimeters.
sent.trans: 全年降雨分布均衡，夏秋季稍多，年平均降雨量619毫米。

sent.orig: Every year, I dedicate a few revision sessions before annual and semi-annual examinations.
sent.trans: 每年，我都会在期考与半期考前提供特别复习辅助。

sent.orig: The province's average annual precipitation is very unevenly distributed, the annual change rate also high.
sent.trans: 全省年平均降水量分布很不均匀，年变率也很大。
